patthana21.43:1.1_0: Narūpiṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca rūpī sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi,
patthana21.43:2.1_0: Narūpiṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca rūpī anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi,
patthana21.43:2.1_1: adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.43:3.1_0: Naarūpiṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca rūpī anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ,
